WRITING.TITLE: Mask recommendation
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm looking for the cheapest to cheaper options considering masks (Do not fog/are solid on my head) available for me. I live in Belgium and my local store offered me these when I asked about their masks:
The dye I4 of 110euro The empire E-flex of 99,95 The empire EVS of 169,95 The valken sly of 89,95
Are those great prices for the masks? Any cheaper masks near me? Thank you for any help!

WRITING.TITLE: Custom playmat idea, any good companies? (Europe)
WRITING.TEXT:
I am looking to design my own playmat and reach out to some artists or playmat company. Any companies you had great experience with? Any ideas/tips/help, all is appreciated!
(My design has quite some details which I could not do so a DIY project for this is excluded.)
Trickster - Kobayashi meets burgers! (Can't edit title, if I use the before sentence as title it won't upload.)

WRITING.TITLE: Into Mirkwood - 1 ring but two players?
WRITING.TEXT:
The Hobbit: On the doorstep; Into Mirkwood scenario 1A states that each player may add 1 copy of Bilbo's Magic ring into his deck. We are playing with two players but the expansion only provides 1 copy of this card. Is this correct?
In the previous expansion (TH:OverHillandUnder) there's an objective card called Bilbo's Magic Ring. Are we supposed to use that ring also? (That cards ability is different and not as good)
I want to upvote but the 420 upvotes fit too well

WRITING.TITLE: New fan! Coming from Anime, have some questions!
WRITING.TEXT:
I watched all two seasons and this is just my favorite of all-time. Right now I started reading the manga but I have some questions:
I read the english versions, my local store only sold the first ten but I might be able to order more from them. But is the english translation far behind compared to the originals? Are they also released on a vast schedule, kinda equal to the originals?
What's the best place to order their manga/DVD/books/merch from? (to Europe, Belgium)
They are releasing a limited edition manga including two new anime episodes. Will those be available with english subtitles as well? If so, where could I pre-order those?
Is "The Recipe book" available in english? And anywhere in stock? (I"ll be trying the recipes on the thread here too!)
Thanks!
